page.title: 11VILLAGE TRAFFIC
page.content: During the week of May 13_17th our class did a survey of the traffic that passed through the village square of Velindre. One group surveyed the direction and the other group the colour of each vehicle. We found that the following cars went through : 37 brown cars, 35 blue cars, 21 cream cars, 15 yellow cars, 13 grey cars, 12 black cars,40 red cars and 3 purple cars. The most popular colour was red and the least popular was purple. We saw many different kinds of lorries. There were Telecom, grocery, coal, furniture and pop lorries. We counted 14 lorries in our survey.Many vans passed through _ paper, mail, telecom and bread vans _ in all, 61 vans went through during the week. The total number of vehicles we counted was 341. {SOPHIE LOTE.
